c74object.name: cpg.network
c74object.digest: A network of neural oscillators designed for sequencing / control signal use
c74object.description: A network of neural oscillators designed for sequencing / control signal use

objarg.name: node_count
objarg.digest: The number of nodes in the network
objarg.description: The number of nodes in the network.

objarg.name: sample_rate
objarg.digest: The sample rate of network calculations
objarg.description: The sample rate of network calculations.

objarg.name: trigger_outputs
objarg.digest: 1(default) object has signal and note trigger outputs, 0: object has only signal outputs
objarg.description: 1(default) object has signal and note trigger outputs, 0: object has only signal outputs

objarg.name: external_signal_inputs
objarg.digest: 0 (default) object has external signal inputs, 0: object has none
objarg.description: 0 (default) object has external signal inputs, 0: object has none

objarg.name: sync_input
objarg.digest: 0 (default) object has sync input, 0: object has none
objarg.description: 0 (default) object has sync input, 0: object has none

objarg.name: tRatio_param
objarg.digest: The ratio of equation params t2:t1
objarg.description: The ratio of equation params t2:t1.
